html:
Jan 5 (Reuters) - Airtel Africa PLC AAF.L:: *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN TANZANIA *AIRTEL AFRICA PLC - FIRST CLOSING OF TOWER SALE IN TANZANIA *AIRTEL AFRICA - GROSS CONSIDERATION FOR TRANSACTION WILL BE $176.1M. *AIRTEL AFRICA - AROUND $60M FROM PROCEEDS WILL BE USED TO INVEST IN NETWORK AND SALES INFRASTRUCTURE IN TANZANIA *AIRTEL AFRICA - PROCEEDS WILL ALSO BE USED FOR DISTRIBUTION TO GOVERNMENT OF TANZANIA, AS PER SETTLEMENT DESCRIBED IN IPO PROSPECTUS DOCUMENT


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 05-JAN-202206:59:49.933 GMT
